name: Tommy's Night
description:
Tommy's Night is my first jam game, and my first "finished" video game ever !

I made it in 48h during Rouflabarbajam III, back in 2014.

----------

Henri : Levels, code

Pietro : Code

Hector : Music

Maxime : Art

Valentin : Art

----------

Tommy is having a nightmare ! Help him go back to bed and avoid evil monsters and what seems to be gigantic holes in the floor (???)

----------

CONTROLS

SPACE - Jump

E - Close your eyes (Do it to walk on carpets and pass through monsters !)

R - Restart
